question: How many inhabitants approximately live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic as of the most recent records?
asked_question_translated: How many inhabitants approximately live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic as of the most recent records?
answer: As of the most recent records, the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic, has approximately 51,000 inhabitants.
answer_translated_eng: As of the most recent records, the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic, has approximately 51,000 inhabitants.
